definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
right in the midpoint/a bull's eye/to hit the nail on the head

sentences.english: There is a discrepancy in the combat log when casting Paladin healing spells.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥記錄當中對騎士的治療記錄有錯誤。

sentences.english: The replier said that he went to a Chrisitan high school when he was young.
sentences.chinese: 迴應當中的一位網友說到自己求學時的經歷。

sentences.english: Can a first cousin at one remove inherit the property?
sentences.chinese: 在堂表兄弟姐妹這一輩當中，他是唯一的男孩。

sentences.english: Those of you who are weak will be merged.
sentences.chinese: 你們當中財務較弱的銀行將會被合併。

sentences.english: The occupation of genetic engineer took a few more years to be named, this time by Poul Anderson.
sentences.chinese: 幾年後這個詞彙才被保羅安德森應用於科學當中。

sentences.english: Daqiang is the most skillful of all the workers here.
sentences.chinese: 大強是這裏所有的工人當中最熟練的。

sentences.english: In the spiritual life we have to make a distinction between two kinds of loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 在靈性生活當中，我們必須懂得區分兩種不同的孤獨。

sentences.english: I chose three of them to show all of you a full view.
sentences.chinese: 我選了當中的三張以展示完整的外觀給您們大家看。

sentences.english: Many of the acolytes have been in hiding amongst the populace.
sentences.chinese: 許多寺僧都隱藏在平民當中。

sentences.english: I feel intimately inside myself where the role belongs.
sentences.chinese: 我能絲絲入扣地在自我當中感受角色之所在。

sentences.english: In my work has to avoid some service not attentive place.
sentences.chinese: 在我的工作當中難免有一些服務不周到的地方。

sentences.english: Some of you are bound to have met with disappointment in the recruiting season.
sentences.chinese: 在招聘季節中，你們當中有的人註定要與失望爲伍。

sentences.english: Until now, the rats under study have met two of the three elements of addiction.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，研究中的大鼠符合成癮三要素當中的二項。

sentences.english: It's all in those side effects I mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 其實都在那些我提到的副作用當中。

sentences.english: Now, improved bedsheets are being designed to be compatible with that technology.
sentences.chinese: 現在，與這一技術相配套的改進牀單正在設計當中。

sentences.english: He recognized Dan as one of his best firends.
sentences.chinese: 大家承認簡是我們當中最聰明的女孩。

definition: to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
